top.title: Russian soldiers tell BBC they saw fellow troops executed on commanders' orders
top.summary: Four men expose the horror and brutality of conditions in the Ukraine war, with two saying they saw soldiers being shot for refusing orders.

top.title: Ukraine remembers its dead as war enters a fifth year
top.summary: Events were held across Ukraine to mark four years since Russia launched its full-scale invasion.

top.title: Mexico hunts 23 inmates sprung from jail during wave of violence
top.summary: The prisoners escaped from a jail in Puerto Vallarta after armed men rammed one of the gates.

top.title: Discord delays age verification plans after user outcry
top.summary: Users were unhappy about plans for age verification to require facial or ID scans.

top.title: US threatens Anthropic with deadline in dispute on AI safeguards
top.summary: The AI developer laid out red lines on military use of its products, a source said.

top.title: Google apologises for Baftas alert to 'see more' on racial slur
top.summary: Google said the news alert was an error that should not have happened.

title.#text: Pete Hegseth’s Pentagon AI bro squad includes a former Uber executive and a private equity billionaire
Apple’s new age verification tools block underage app downloads where required by law
Apple’s touchscreen MacBooks might also have a Dynamic Island
